meanings.definition: Cycloparaffins: Saturated hydrocarbons with one or more rings of carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: I learned in science class that cycloparaffins are saturated hydrocarbons with carbon rings.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study the properties of cycloparaffins to understand their structure better.
meanings.sent3: The cycloparaffins at the party were the most stable and content with their carbon rings.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the stability of cycloparaffins, unbreakable and secure.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful models to explain the concept of cycloparaffins to the students.

meanings.definition: Cycloparaffins: A type of cyclic compound with only single bonds between carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The organic chemistry textbook explained how cycloparaffins have single bonds between carbon atoms.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are investigating the properties of cycloparaffins for potential applications.
meanings.sent3: The cycloparaffins in the lab were known for their strong and stable single bonds.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty to the team was as unbreakable as the single bonds in cycloparaffins.
meanings.sent5: The students conducted an experiment to observe the behavior of cycloparaffins in different conditions.
